Mongoose Publishing is a British manufacturer of role-playing games, miniatures, and card games, publishing material since 2001. Its product lines include Traveller, Paranoia, Sea of Thieves, 2300AD and Shield Maidens.

March 21, 2025 - Mongoose Publishing was founded in Swindon, England, in 2001 by Matthew Sprange and Alex Fennell. Sprange initially wanted to publish a miniatures game, but he ultimately went with the less expensive alternative of using Wizards of the Coast's d20 System license.
